name: Stickman Fighting Online Battle
description:
Some crazy people bring knives to gun fights, now you can bring a stick to the battle! Stick Fighting is the newest multiplayer shooting game on your device. Take control of your stick man and arm him to the teeth to battle your way to victory!

***** Play the newest and best online multiplayer action game available on your device.
***** Compete against opponents all over the globe
***** Maneuver the office map and annihilate the enemy (pretend its your own office and co-workers if you like!)
***** Use both guns and melee weapons to defeat your friends
***** Raise stats such as aim, kill streak and more to finish top of the leader-board

Coming Soon!
- Customize Your Weapons Arsenal For Unlimited Fighting.
- Dozens More Guns And Melee Weapons To Choose From.
- Tens Of New Maps To Add To The Battle.
